title: What's up with LeBlanc's outfit?
body:
I mean really, she wears a single thigh high sock, with a one piece bathing suit that ain't going to protect her ass from shit, looks like she cut a skirt in half and stitched to a Final Fantasy belt, has a crown that looks like she's suppose to be headbutting people, and a cape that has a collar that came from the 80s. This bitch looks like a dominatrix that buys everything Gucci. 

And her staff is tacky af.

replies.body:
{{champion:240}} : She had one crazy getup! Them city-folk clothes is getting ridiculous.

Skaarl growls

{{champion:240}} : Yeah, I'll try it on later.

Can't wait to see Kled wearing that outfit...

That is actually a pretty good question..
Chances are there will be a rework at some point. I think being highly overkill and extravagant is part of her personality and design, but it could be done a bit better.
You would think with her background she would have a more simple but elegant look to her outfit, or something on the more regal side.
She's a bad b*tch that's about it LOL
